faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: The seminar deals with German language literary texts from the beginning to the end of the 19th century, introducing to some of the key authors such as Gryphius, Lessing, Lenz, Goethe, Schiller, Kleist, Hölderlin, Mörike, Tieck, Büchner, Heine, Fontane and Hauptmann. The course will concentrate on close reading techniques and hermeneutics and focus on the discussion and analysis of selected literary works, but touching on various issues of literary methodology and theory. Even though it cannot provide a comprehensive history of literature, it will proceed chronologically to enable the students to better understand the historical basis and development of literary forms and topics.
description.et: Saksa kirjanduse proseminari kursus hõlmab saksakeelse kirjanduse tekste kuni19.sajandi lõpuni. Käsitletakse selliseid autoreid nagu  Gryphius, Lessing, Lenz, Goethe, Schiller, Kleist, Hölderlin, Mörike, Tieck, Büchner, Heine, Fontane ja Hauptmann. Põhirõhk on lugemistehnikatel ja hermeneutikal ning valitud kirjandusteoste analüüsil ja arutelul, kuid puudutatakse ka erinevaid kirjandusteooriaid ja metodoloogikat.

objectives.en: The course will give the students an overview over the German speaking literature from the medieval ages till the end of the 19th century, covering many of the key authors. The crucial developments and topics will be dealt with, covering the very beginnings of literature in medieval times, Baroque, Enlightenment, Sturm und Drang, Classicism, Romanticism, Biedermeier, Realism and some authors not fully fitting any of these epochs. The students will learn how to analyse different literary texts (prose, poetry and drama).

learning_outcomes.en:
After the course, the students will be familiar with a good number of the most important authors and developments in German literary history form the beginning until the end of the 19th century. They will have become accustomed to literary concepts and have acquired skills how to discuss and critically analyse literature of different periods and genres, orally and in writing.
They will have developed digital skills such as using search engines and data banks while being aware of their structure and operation modes so that they can critically evaluate the sources and their reliability. Furthermore, they have practised using various word processing functions and creating content in different formats.

grade_preconditions.et: Arvestusele/eksamile pääsemise tingimuseks on vähemalt 75% ulatuses osavõtt loengutest/seminaridest ja kõikide kodutööde tegemine.

grade_evaluation.et:
- Lugemiskontrollid kogu semestri jooksul
- Väike ettekanne
- Vabalt valitud kirjandusteksti analüüs

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
